title.rendered: Lumizen Wellness CBD Announces Site-Wide Sale on CBD Products to Make Way for New Summer Line

content.rendered:
Lumizen Wellness Mental Health

Lumizen Wellness Vibe with CBD

Lumizen Wellness CBD Good Day

Lumizen Wellness CBD Announces Site-Wide Sale on CBD Products to Make Way for New Summer Line

We’re thrilled to be introducing our new summer line and to celebrate, we’re offering our customers the chance to save big on all our CBD products,”

— Matt Meagher

HENDERSON, NEVADA, UNITED STATES, April 28, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Lumizen Wellness CBD, a leading provider of high-quality CBD products, is excited to announce a site-wide sale on all CBD products in anticipation of the introduction of its new summer line. Customers can now save big on a wide range of products, including high-end CBD oil, topicals, gummies, pet CBD, and the brand’s new line of handmade artisan soap infused with CBD.

“We’re thrilled to be introducing our new summer line and to celebrate, we’re offering our customers the chance to save big on all our CBD products,” said Matt Meagher, Chief Marketing Officer for Lumizen Wellness CBD. “We pride ourselves on providing only the highest-quality CBD products, and this sale offers the perfect opportunity to stock up and try out some of our newest offerings.”

Lumizen Wellness CBD’s products are formulated with care, using only the finest ingredients and the latest technology to ensure customers receive the most effective and purest CBD products on the market. Whether customers are looking for CBD oil for pain management or topicals for skincare, Lumizen Wellness CBD offers a wide range of options to fit any lifestyle and need.

In addition to its current line of popular CBD products, Lumizen Wellness CBD is proud to introduce its new line of handmade artisan soap infused with CBD. This exciting new addition to the Lumizen Wellness CBD family provides customers with a unique and luxurious experience that combines the benefits of CBD with the soothing and nourishing properties of handmade soap.

This site-wide sale offers customers the chance to save big on Lumizen Wellness CBD’s already affordable prices. Customers can take advantage of this limited-time offer to stock up on their favorite products, try something new, or simply take advantage of the savings.

To take advantage of this special sale, simply visit the Lumizen Wellness CBD website and shop the extensive collection of high-quality CBD products. With prices this low, there’s never been a better time to experience the benefits of Lumizen Wellness CBD.

About Lumizen Wellness CBD:

Lumizen Wellness CBD is a leading provider of high-quality CBD products, including CBD oil, topicals, gummies, pet CBD, and more. All Lumizen Wellness CBD products are formulated with care using only the finest ingredients and the latest technology to ensure customers receive the most effective and purest CBD products on the market.

Contact Information:

Lumizen Wellness CBD
Henderson, Nevada 89044
Phone: (800) 213-7407
Email: info@lumizenwellness.com
Website: https://lumizenwellness.com

Matt Meagher
Lumizen Wellness
+1 800-213-7407
email us here

April 28, 2023, 14:23 GMT
